1.<center>王家の財宝を荒らす者は 誰だ……。|我が眠りを妨げる者は 誰だ…: Who desecrates the treasures of the crown?|Who disturbs my sleep?

2.<center>また現れたのか……いやしい賊め……。|これ以上 王家の財宝を荒ら: You showed up again... Nasty bandits. No|more shall they ravage the royal treasure|and disturb my slumber.

3.<center>秘宝の守護者を おそれず|何度も やってきおって……。|貴様……: How many times have you come to me, unafraid|of the guardians of the treasure? You... Who|are you?

4.<center>貴様の勇気に免じ 我が名を教えてやろう……。|我は この大ピラミ: For your bravery, I will tell you my name. I|am the Pharaoh of the Pharaohs who built the|Great Pyramid. Arach-Kha.

5.<center>我のなきがらは 神秘のチカラを宿す|秘宝と共に このピラミッドに:
My dead body was placed in this pyramid|along with the treasure that holds the|secret power of the gods. All to protect the|
|golden treasure.

6.<center>予想どおり……我の死後 黄金の秘宝を|狙う者が あとを絶たなかっ:
As expected... Since my death, there have|been no end of hunters after the Golden|Hallows. A scourge that calls itself the|
|seeker of treasures.

7.<center>神聖なる黄金の秘宝が けがされぬよう|我は この地に眠る死者を: I have raised the dead who lie here so that|the sacred treasure of gold may not be|damaged. As guardians of our treasures.

8.<center>秘宝の守護者の中には かつて|ファラオと呼ばれた 時の王たちもい: Among the guardians of the treasures are the|kings of time, once called the Pharaohs. The|Golden Hallows are the pride of my family.

9.<center>なぜだ……。|なぜ しつように 黄金の秘宝を狙う……？|何が貴様: Why? Why do you persistently seek the Golden|Hallows? What is it that drives you to the|treasure?

10.<center>幾度となく この地を訪れる 貴様は……|まさか 伝説の秘宝の探求: You who visit this place so many times...|You're not the legendary seeker of hidden|treasures. Syndra? Why are you here?

11.<center>伝説の秘宝の探求者 シンドラ……。|まさか 死んだはずの貴様と: Syndra, seeker of legendary treasures. I|never thought I'd see you again after you|died.

12.<center>シンドラ……。思い返せば 貴様と我の勝負は|いまだ 決していなか: Cindra. Looking back, you and I have never|had a match. Perhaps it was fate that|brought us together.

13.<center>おかしい……。貴様とは 何度も戦ったが|なぜ 愛用していた あの:
That's funny. I've fought you many times,|but why don't you use that curved sword of|the sun god that you used to love so much?|
|Do you underestimate me? Oh, abominable!

14.<center>伝説の秘宝の探求者 シンドラの証たる|太陽神の曲刀を どうあって:
How dare you not wield the curved sword of|the sun god, the proof of Syndra, the seeker|of legendary treasures? You can't be... You|
|are not Syndra?

15.<center>そうか……。貴様 シンドラではなかったのだな。|あやつのような: I see. You're not Syndra. How is it that a|seeker of treasures with a bone like|yours... can come back here again?

16.<center>どうしたことだ……。胸が おどる……。|貴様の足音が この地に: What's going on? My heart is pounding. Every|time I hear your footsteps approaching...|What have you done? What did you do to me?

17.<center>きょ……今日は 少し遅かったな……。|このアラハ・カーメンを じ: My God... You're a little late today. You're|messing with Arach Karmen. I'd say you have|more guts than Syndra.

18.<center>遅い……！ 遅いぞ 貴様ああぁぁぁ……！|さては 貴様……我の心:
Too slow...! You're late, you aaaaaaah...!|So it's you... You've been playing with my|heart, haven't you? I won't allow it, I|
|won't allow it...!

19.<center>我は 死にながらにして 生きがいを|見つけてしまった……。それは: I have found my purpose in life, even in|death. It is... To fight you for the golden|treasure.

20.<center>よく来たな 奇跡の探求者よ！|さあ 今日も 我の血潮をたぎらせて: Welcome, miracle seeker! Let my blood run|hot today! Go, guardians of the treasure!

22.<center>秘宝の守護者よ。|王家に仇なす者に 死を与えよ……！: Guardians of the Treasures. Give death to|those who would avenge the crown.

23.<center>秘宝の守護者よ。|王家に仇なす者に 死を与えよ……！: Guardians of the Treasures. Give death to|those who would avenge the crown.

34.<center>秘宝の守護者よ。|王家に仇なす者に 死を与えよ……！: Guardians of the Treasures. Give death to|those who would avenge the crown.

35.<center>秘宝の守護者よ。|王家に仇なす者に 死を与えよ……！: Guardians of the Treasures. Give death to|those who would avenge the crown.

36.<center>秘宝の守護者よ。|王家に仇なす者に 死を与えよ……！: Guardians of the Treasures. Give death to|those who would avenge the crown.

37.<center>秘宝の守護者よ。|王家に仇なす者に 死を与えよ……！: Guardians of the Treasures. Give death to|those who would avenge the crown.

38.<center>秘宝の守護者よ。|王家に仇なす者に 死を与えよ……！: Guardians of the Treasures. Give death to|those who would avenge the crown.

39.<center>ゆけっ 秘宝の守護者よ！|王家に仇なす者に 死を与えるのだ！: Go, guardians of the treasure! Give death to|those who would avenge the crown!

40.<center>死せる者に 生きがいを与えるとは|貴様は まさに 奇跡の探求者よ: You are truly a miracle seeker, giving the|dead a reason to live.

41.<center>ゆけっ 秘宝の守護者よ！|今日こそ この者に 泣きを見せるのだ！: Go, guardians of the treasure! Today is the|day you will make him weep!
